thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 18 of 2268
thread.title: Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text:
I chose Blinds2go purely from a Google search and from some reviews I had read on Trust Pilot, and also because they were about 50% cheaper than Hillary's Blinds.
As I have the whole house to fit out with new blinds, I decided to order just one first to see what the quality and fit was like. So after receiving my free sample pack, I duly chose my blind requirements and placed an order.
It took about 10 days to arrive and it was delivered well packaged and completely undamaged.
The instructions were simple and straightforward and everything fitted exactly as it was supposed to, complete with all the necessary fixings and brackets.
When the other rooms are ready after redecoration, I will certainly be ordering the next 10 blinds from Blinds2go.
